title: Searching for 3 Players around Platinum 5+
body:
Heyho Ladies & Gents!
Me and a friend (B Bash) are searching for three players to create a Ranked Team.
We are looking for Top, support and adc, would be nice if the botlane is a duo already but not neccesarry.
The only thing you need is to be kind and not to be a rager. 
Also you should be fine to learn and talk about the mistakes we/you made and dont be mad if you get some positive feedback, and grow and learn as a team.

Would be great if you are higher than Platinum 5. If not just add one of us and we will play a Match with you :)
By the way im sorry for my English! I am from Germany but i think you can understand it
If you are interested just add me or B Bash on League! 
 Peace out!

replies.body: Im deutschem Forum darfst du übrigens ruhig auf deutsch schreiben ^^
